comments.text:
While having a private chat with a nick, if something happens to the nick (time-out, nick left the server...), the error message 
[20:09]	===	The nickname “nick” does not exist.
appears in the network tab.

I think it should pop-up in the nick tab instead, as one seldom check the network tab for such errors.

In this situation, one is led to believe that the nick isn't answering, which is wrong.

Sugnim++
